text:
@HumanityForward Hello Humaity Family,
     Thank you for reaching out during this time of need.  I started my residential cleaning business last year cleaning Airbnb’s as a contractor.  Due to the  Coronavirus, this platform was shut down by the powers at play because of fear of widespread. Help
